titles.title: FIRE Act
FIRE Act
Forbidding the Increase of Rogue Enforcers Act
To freeze hiring activity for the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms, and Explosives, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Forbidding the Increase of Rogue Enforcers Act or the FIRE Act
This bill prohibits hiring and related activities within the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives (ATF).
Specifically, the bill prohibits within the ATF
new appointments to existing positions,the establishement of new positions,new assignments of duties, andassignments, details, or transfers to new duty stations.
